title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream: The color green in a dream is one of the important visions that many people search for because they see it in a dream, but these interpretations change between those who see them, as they differ between a married woman and an unmarried woman, and differ according to dream interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about green, Ibn Shaheen explains Whoever sees the color green in a dream is the one who waters green plants, this indicates that the dreamer will receive a huge amount of money soon. This previous vision may be a sign that the person is dreaming of those dreams in which this person will be able to achieve the various goals and desires that he seeks Achieved. Finally, this vision expresses that this person will be able to obtain a large amount of money and break even without facing any problems at work or stress. Green in a dreamIf one sees in a dream that there is a group of green spaces and green plants in front of the house in which he resides In which the fortuneteller is, it means that this person has the ability to fulfill many of the desires that he desires and seeks to achieve, and it also shows that. The dreamer's life will become better than it is now, in terms of his social and material life, as well as psychologically. But if one sees in his dream the same vision in addition to collecting these crops, this is evidence that the dreamer will face many problems and obstacles in his life and also expresses his inability To get rid of or overcome these problems. Green in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she sees herself in a place full of green plants and that her work is inside that place, this means that this girl will soon approach a good man who wants to marry her. It also indicates that this person will be the reason for her happiness in her next life. As for an unmarried girl who sees in a dream that the greenery around her is losing its luster and withering, this indicates many problems that this girl will face in the near future, and this vision serves as a warning to pay attention. To the difficulties and problems surrounding her.Green in a dream for a pregnant womanStill not finding an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Since interpreters have interpreted many symbols such as color symbols and different locations, therefore we will find that a place full of green plants is interpreted by jurists as good in most cases, but there are two cases in which we must put many Red lines because their interpretation is negative, and after the dreamer sees them in a dream, he will find a lot of loss and destruction when he wakes up. The first case: The green land is full of light green plants, and it is not yellow, because if they appear yellow in the dream, it will be interpreted as illness. The second case: If the The dreamer dreams that the cultivated land in which he saw himself in a dream is burning until he eats all the fruits on it, then this is interpreted either as social problems or financial losses and perhaps bankruptcy and drought sooner rather than later.

title: Interpretation of dreams to see a basin in a dream for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a basin in a dream for an ordinary married and pregnant woman. Seeing a basin in a dream indicates goodness and comfort after distress, and if it is intact and if it is punctured or broken, this indicates financial losses. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a basin in a dream by senior scholars and jurists is an interpretation Dreams, interpretation of a dream about seeing a basin in a dream for a married and pregnant woman, interpretation of a basin in a dream and indicators of a good and bad vision for the basin and the home appliance basin is equipped with tap water in the form of a bowl and is used for washing hands, face and laundry, including what is used to wash dishes and what is used for the bathroom. We use it a lot in reality. But what is the interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream? We will show you the interpretation of a dream about a basin for a bowl for married people and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing a basin in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a basin in a dream. Sherine also mentioned that it contains many connotations of what equates to good, including what equates to evil. The interpretation of dreaming about a basin in a dream is evidence of happiness, comfort, stability, and all that is good. The interpretation of seeing a dream about a basin and its ablution in a dream shows a lot of goodness and comfort after the dreamer’s distress. But dreaming of having a water basin full of money in a dream is evidence that you have a lot of money and maintain an excellent position. Seeing yourself drinking from the basin in a dream is evidence of sustenance, grace, and blessings. Seeing a pierced basin in a dream is a sign of loss and death. Dreaming of a broken basin in a dream Evidence of the problems and differences that the dreamer is suffering from. An empty sink in a dream is a defect, deprivation, loneliness, and a bad omen for its owner. Seeing someone washing his face in the sink in a dream indicates the disappearance of his tension and the joy of his life in the coming period. Also follow: Interpretation of a dream about seeing washing clothes in a dream for a woman Pregnant, married, and pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about a bowl containing a women’s bowl: Seeing a bathroom in a bathroom in a dream for a girl is evidence that many people are approaching her because of her beauty. Interpretation of seeing a woman washing in a basin in a dream indicates that she will achieve her desire and goals. Dreaming of seeing a basin full of water in A single woman’s dream is evidence of her marriage to a suitable person who is characterized by generosity, morals, and good treatment. Therefore, seeing a broken basin in a dream of an engagement with a pot woman is evidence of the engagement being broken. The interpretation of a dream about a dirty and polluted basin in a girl’s dream is evidence of the presence of a hypocritical and deceitful person. And it is harmful to her life. Interpretation of seeing a basin full of water in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a basin in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the stability of her family, the tranquility of her life, and her sense of peace. Interpretation of dreaming of a basin full of water in a dream for a married woman is evidence that there are many children. Dreaming of a basin in a married woman’s dream Evidence of the many debts and fears that her husband suffers from. Seeing a married woman washing her face and hands in the sink in a dream indicates the end of the argument with her husband and her happiness with him. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a towel in a dream for a married woman and a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about a pregnant basin: Seeing a basin in a dream A pregnant woman is evidence that her birth will be smooth

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing phlegm in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadot website provides you with an explanation for seeing phlegm in a dream in its entirety, as it is known as phlegm, which is a sticky liquid that comes out of the mouth. Sleep for ordinary and married women, as well as the interpretation of phlegm in a pregnant woman’s full dream, as well as in a man’s dreams. We have collected for you from the books of major scholars, interpretations of dreams and visions, and experts in interpretation. Follow the article. Why do you dream of phlegm by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of phlegm in a dream, which was completed in the book of the scholar Ibn Sirin, said that this is the testimony of one who collects money and does not spend it. Also, seeing phlegm in a dream is a desirable vision and indicates recovery from diseases and getting rid of all worries and problems. It indicates Seeing phlegm in a dream indicates that a science student is a sign of academic success and finding a job in which he can spend money for his family. The appearance of hair or threads from the dreamer’s mouth indicates an improvement in his living conditions and indicates longevity and an escape from adversity. Seeing phlegm in a woman’s dream indicates the interpretation of phlegm that comes out Complete in a dream for a single woman to the end of trials, the release of everything she suffered and the beginning of relief. Green phlegm in a woman’s dream indicates the purity and purity of the heart and the improvement of her condition, and this is an increase in kindness and support. To dream of a girl full of yellow or black phlegm means joy and happiness and that she will enter A period full of optimism. Why do you dream of phlegm for a married woman? For a married woman, the complete expulsion of phlegm in a dream is one of the desired visions and testifies to the stability of her life and her salvation from all problems and troubles. Also, seeing phlegm coming out in a sick woman’s dream is evidence of a speedy recovery from the disease and improvement of her health. Seeing phlegm coming out of people, but no one sees it in the dream in full, is an indication of the kindness and support that you will receive in secret. Why do you dream of pregnant phlegm? The interpretation of seeing phlegm in a dream in full for a pregnant woman is generally desirable and testifies to the safety of herself and her newborn from All problems and diseases. The secretion of phlegm from a pregnant woman’s mouth is evidence of the ease of childbirth, the relief of her conditions, and relief from all her troubles. Also, seeing phlegm in a dream complete and coming out for a woman is a sign of the nutrition and benefits that you will reap in your next life. Phlegm in a dream, Kamel Fahd Al-Osaimi, said Dr. Fahd Al-Osaimi Seeing phlegm coming out in a dream is a complete vision that indicates relief from adversity and the dreamer’s salvation from worries and problems. If you have a dream and want it interpreted, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about holding the Qur’an in the hand

preview.html: The Qur’an is abundant in dreams, and seen in abundance, and we will look at the interpretation of a dream about holding the Qur’an in our hands in this article. Interpretation of a dream about holding the Qur’an in the hand in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman may dream of holding the Qur’an in her hand, and it has many connotations, the most important of which is a dream, and we look at some of them as follows: Next: When he sees an unmarried woman in his dream, holding his partner’s hand, this indicates that he is holding his partner’s hand. She has good morals and a good reputation that she is famous for with her friends and family. It also indicates that she is the center of attention of many around her because of her unique personality. And that God will protect her from Everything hateful and evil in all aspects of her life. A single woman’s dream of seeing her holding the Qur’an in her hand indicates God’s satisfaction with her in all aspects of her life. A dream about holding the Qur’an in the hand of an unmarried woman, after a young man gave it to her as a gift, indicates the approaching date of her engagement to this young man. The dream of an unmarried girl while reading the Qur’an indicates that she expects comfort soon and if she is suffering from a certain problem, it will be solved soon. Seeing the Qur’an in the life of an unmarried woman and her commitment to it and reading it indicates her adherence to the matters of her religion and maintains her religious customs. Adherence to the Qur’an and its continuous reading in Alone indicates the goodness that descends upon her. It also indicates ambition for the highest positions and progress towards achieving goals and ambitions. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream of holding the Qur’an in the hand in a dream for a married woman. And we arrive at the case of the married woman, so if she sees the Qur’an in a dream while holding it in her hand This indicates the following: If a woman sees in her dream that she is holding the Qur’an in her hand, this indicates the good that will befall her. It is a testimony to the well-being of her and her family and her commitment to fulfilling the rights of her home and her husband to the fullest. The Qur’an in a married woman’s dream shows her commitment to her husband’s rights, calm and stability. Which prevail in her life. The Qur’an also shows in a married woman’s dream that this woman is living a good life. It indicates her ability to overcome the various problems and difficulties that fill her life. Seeing a married woman sleeping and bringing the Qur’an close to her heart and chest indicates that she is going through a major crisis and begging the Holy Qur’an. To solve this problem. The Qur’an is the refuge and salvation from these problems that dominate her life. In the life of a married woman, the Holy Qur’an shows her adherence to the Qur’an in crises and her commitment to the Qur’an in overcoming problems. Adherence to the Holy Qur’an indicates this wife’s love for her husband and the sanctity of her married life. If the woman A married woman desires to become pregnant and give birth to offspring, so the dream is good news that her desire will come true soon, and that God will grant her pregnancy and childbirth soon. Interpretation of a dream of holding the Qur’an in the hand in a dream for a divorced woman: Sometimes a divorced woman sees in her dream a dream that she is holding the Qur’an in her hands and holding it, and this vision has many connotations, Among them is this. Seeing a divorced woman clinging to the Holy Qur’an is evidence of her clinging to it to solve her crises and sadness after her divorce. They will get rid of the problems and live in peace.

title: Interpretation of seeing Facebook in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Facebook in a dream Interpretation of seeing opening Facebook in a dream means that the dreamer wants to express his feelings to someone. Also, seeing and browsing Facebook in a dream indicates solving the problems that the dreamer is suffering from. Seeing yourself sending a message in a dream is evidence that you are hearing some good news about the period Next of your life. Dreaming of talking on social media also indicates a great benefit coming. Seeing Facebook in a dream for single womenSeeing Facebook in a dream for a single woman is a sign that she will enter a new life that will be better for her. To dream of browsing Facebook pages means that single women are looking About the right person. Also, seeing that she is sending a message to a stranger in a dream indicates her longing for the absent person and her sadness for him. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a Facebook account: Interpretation of stealing your Facebook account in a dream indicates that the viewer feels some psychological problems during this time. Also, it can symbolize This dream also indicates goodness and great living that the dreamer will have in his next life. Also, seeing the account being stolen and then returned again in the dream indicates good circumstances and an end to the problems facing the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a Facebook account in a dream: Interpretation of seeing a man creating an account on Facebook. In a dream, many appropriate changes occur in his life. Seeing the creation of a Facebook account in a dream for a woman indicates a happy married life full of blessings and pleasures. Interpretation of dreams for someone working as a block in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about preventing a lover in a dream indicates kindness and great happiness between them and putting an end to problems and disagreements. Interpretation of a dream about social networking sites in a dream: Seeing social networking sites in a dream in the first sense indicates the person’s good morals and his good and old relationships. Also, seeing in a dream that a program has been deleted from the mobile phone indicates that the dreamer wants to change some things that are no longer important to him. If If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a peacock in a dream for single, married, divorced women and men

preview.html: This dream can carry many clues that depend on the condition of the dreamer, and this will be explained in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a peacock in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees a colorful peacock in a dream. This is an indication of positive transformations in her life. Seeing a black peacock in The dream represents the sins committed by that girl. A green peacock in one’s dream indicates the presence of a man who has a lot of love and respect for her. A blue peacock in her dream means her marriage to a special person. If the girl is not married yet and is late in marriage and she sees a peacock flying in the sky, then this It indicates that she will get married soon. If a girl sees a peacock dying in a dream, this indicates her disappointment and her need for a life partner in the near future and may mean her inability to make the right decisions in her life. A peacock in an unmarried woman’s dream can express her arrogance and arrogance. In Other times, this vision may indicate a love story that the girl will live in the coming period, or that there is someone who will support her in her problems. Buying a peacock indicates the news of her marriage to a man of wealth and status that will achieve what she desires in a life of happiness and stability. If she dreams that she is afraid of a peacock in a dream, This indicates her lack of self-confidence. Or it may be a sign that he wants to get something but is afraid to get it. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bird (birds) in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a peacock in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a peacock in a dream, this portends something Very good will prevail over her. And seeing a peacock in its magnificent form could be a sign of the stability of her life with her husband. In other cases, it may be a sign that pregnancy is imminent for that woman. If a woman sees that she is feeding a peacock in a dream, this represents the charitable work that she is doing And the donation that she makes for her family. Seeing a colorful peacock in a married woman’s dream expresses the mutual love between her and her husband. When she sees a black peacock, this means that her husband is cheating on her and there are many problems between them. Seeing a beautiful peacock in a woman’s dream is good news for her. God will bless her with a beautiful child. Seeing a woman playing with a peacock in a dream. It is a harbinger of good news in the coming days or the return of a person of special status to her. At other times, it may indicate the rise of her husband’s career at work or the achievement of many successes in her field of work. Interpretation Seeing a peacock in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees herself giving her ex-husband a gift of a peacock in a dream, this means the death of her succession with him and her return to him. Seeing a white peacock in a divorced woman’s dream means her relationship with a good man. While seeing a peacock in green is a sign of comfort that almost permeates her life. A colored peacock in a divorced woman’s dream is good news that God will open the doors of livelihood for her. When you see a black peacock, it shows that sadness that you feel inside. Seeing the same peacock means that positive changes will occur in the life of a divorced woman that will bring her happiness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sitting with the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about sitting with the king in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, there are many visions that we see in our dreams, and since each vision has its own interpretation, one of these visions is the vision of sitting with the king in a dream. It is considered one of the visions that may confuse some people, when they see it, which is the vision of sitting with the king in a dream, so that some people think it is a good vision, and others believe. It is a vision of evil and you cannot find an explanation for this disturbing vision, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about sitting with the king in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and all the interpretations and meanings accompanying it. With her.Interpretation of seeing a ruler or king in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a king in a dream is considered one of the important visions that contains many details and has many different interpretations, which are as follows: If a woman sees a ruler in her dream while she is married, this is a sign of her death and the end of her term, and God Almighty high. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she has become a queen or a sultan, this indicates her high status and the high status of her family. If a married woman dreams that she is a Sultan or a Queen, this indicates great love and tenderness that she will unite with her husband and that he will have her desires and fulfill her desires. At that time some jurists interpreted this vision as an evil and bad vision, because it indicates the death of the dreamer, but if she saw The dreamer is that she sat with a king in her dream and became a queen like him and possessed all the powers. Which she owns and saw herself in royal clothes and a luxurious crown on her head, and the dream confirms that her status is great, and that her friends respect her and give her appreciation and respect. There is no doubt that the love that The Visionary receives from those around her is due to many of the reasons behind it, which are as follows: It should be noted that the more religious the Dreamer becomes, the stronger and wiser she becomes. But it must be known that it is also clear that he keeps their secrets and collects Everyone intentionally and does not cause strife and strife among them, and therefore he is like a dove of peace among them, spreading love and safety among them. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the king’s servants in a dream. Since its interpretation varies according to the status and gender of the fortuneteller, the interpretation of seeing the king’s servants The king in a dream is as follows: Whoever sees a muezzin and the king gives permission to his spy, and whoever sees that he is the king’s guard, has a debt. Confusion in speech.. confirmed in the novel He will suffer torture and the king’s narration is in layers. If the king sees his veil standing, then they stand upright in their policy, and if he sees them sitting, then they are loose and short-minded in relation to things. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting long hair in a dream for a son Sirin: The king’s gift in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, since seeing the king’s gift in a dream varies according to the form of the gift as well as the details related to the dream. If it is beautiful and loved by the dreamer, it is a sign of kindness. The dream is as follows: It is worth noting that Ibn Sirin says that he sees the king in a dream and gives the priest a gift, a sign of

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream?

preview.html: Khadot website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream. A whale is a marine animal that lives in seas and oceans and is famous for its large size, so it feeds on small fish. A large whale in the sea indicates many testimonies and interpretations that we have collected for you, dear ones, in the interpretation of God. Senior scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions.. You are accused of knowing the interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream completely. You should read the article. Why does a whale dream in a woman's dream? A single woman sees a whole whale in a dream, which indicates kindness and the fulfillment of her desires and goals. The presence of a beautiful whale in a girl's dream is considered a close marriage to a handsome young man. A whale attacking a single woman in a dream is complete evidence of the presence of an unsuitable person in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing a large whale in the sea for an unmarried woman and escaping from it in her dream, which indicates salvation from all evil in her life and the beginning of a happy life, God knows best. See also: Why is the dream completed by seeing a hook in a dream Why does a married woman dream of a whale in a dream full of a married woman A married woman who sees a whole whale in a dream means the good that will come to her and her husband and the end of her troubles. The whale indicates her good conditions, getting rid of worries and sorrows and the beginning of a happy life with her husband. The dream of swimming with a whale in a woman's dream testifies to the superiority of her children in her life and enjoying good wealth. The whole whale in a woman's dream shows kindness, comfort and relief from suffering, and this is one of the auspicious visions for a woman, God willing. The vision indicates A large whale or a group of whales in a dream for a married woman indicates many livelihoods for her and her husband. See also: Ibn Sirin's dream book to know the full tone in a dream Why does a whale dream in a pregnant woman's dream Seeing a whale in a pregnant woman's dream means her good and abundant livelihood for her, her husband and her future fetus. The whale is also considered a symbol of easy childbirth and good pregnancy health. Seeing a whole whale in a dream means getting rid of all the problems and troubles that she faced during pregnancy. Fear of a whale is evidence of fear of pregnancy or the appearance of a fetus for a teenager or a human being, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a whole squid in a dream Why does a whale dream in a dream full of people? Seeing a whale in a man's dream may indicate an abundance of food and many good things that he will get in his next life. And a whale in a man's dream means getting rid of worries and problems and the end of sadness. A whale attacking a person in a dream fully shows the problems that he will face in his life, and God knows best. See also: Why does an octopus dream in a dream If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing a grandfather, father’s father or mother’s father, and seeing my grandfather in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a grandfather for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, if the dead person is alive, I saw my grandfather seeing the dead grandmother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s grandfather. Interpretation of the grandfather’s dream before going into the psychological meanings and meanings that the grandfather symbolizes in the dream, we need to become familiar with the term or pronunciation in Language because the interpretation of dreams depends on a large proportion of pronunciation, letter and meaning in dictionaries and dictionaries. . It is an approach taken by the pioneers of interpretation and is still followed to this day. It is stated in dictionaries that the word grandfather, in addition to the meaning of “father or mother,” means livelihood or position and rank among people, and grandfather also means seeking or acquiring knowledge. This is the general linguistic meaning of the word grandfather. As for the grandfather in the interpretation of dreams, it is a symbol of religion or holiness, if he appears with a white beard and a white robe, or shines from the face of light, expressing divine or spiritual beauty. It is in our subconscious mind the basis of the universe or existence, so that some of us imagine that we saw a prophet among the prophets, or a pious man or an imam through seeing his grandfather. Seeing a grandfather in a dream is still very puzzling, as some interpretations speak of his appearance in a dream as a kind of angelic transformation, and others speak of righteous saints. }. In fact, the vision varies from one culture to another, but in our Arab, Islamic and Christian environment, the grandfather is considered a symbol of religion and Sharia itself. Interpretation of the grandfather in an unmarried girl’s dream: The grandfather appears in a person’s dream in his true form, and sometimes he sees him in the stereotypical image of an old man, with a white beard, White dress, smiling, bright face. These qualities, if they accompany the appearance of a grandfather in a single person’s dream, are good signs and mean that the girl is good and religious and feels in the depths of her absolute satisfaction with herself and that she is on the verge of a spiritually and morally happy life, even if material matters are somewhat difficult for her, for the hope that still drives her To achieve everything she seeks through her absolute dependence on God. But if the grandfather appears in his form as well as in his wake, the interpretation is completely different here. Seriousness in the essence and content of this context does not constitute a sacred or spiritual aura as much as it symbolizes purely secular concepts associated with seriousness. Or toil, or work, or the like. The more elegant the grandfather is in his dress and beautiful figure, the more positive the vision, which means that the girl can accept a joyful event or receive good news. She can rely on her grandfather's surname or first name to know the type and content of the news. Simply put, she will find a special job if her grandfather sees her father’s or mother’s child, or both, to tell her that they are giving the dreamer a dress, robe, shoes, or just a gift that she loves or desires. The important thing is that seeing the grandfather in this picture will be good news for her and a title for a new scene full of goodness and blessings. Interpretation of a grandfather in a married woman’s dream: A married woman’s goal in life is the stability of her home and the happiness of her family, especially the success of her children, and there are married women who want to become pregnant or have a child or a female. In this general context,
